message.raw:
Use new zprocess functionality to interrupt communication with child. This
includes sending data to the child, which previously was not interruptible,
but would block for remote devices if not connected to a remote server.

Only remaining issue is that terminate() is blocking and in the GUI when there
is no remote server present.
